questions.question: What material was studied for its giant pressure dependence and dimensionality switching in the research?
At what pressure does a phase transition occur in [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz, inducing an orbital re-ordering?
What type of magnetic system does [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz become after the phase transition at high pressures?
Is the dominant exchange parameter in [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz reduced or increased under compression?
What method was used to perform magnetic susceptibility measurements on [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz?
What is the effect of pressure on the Néel temperature (TN) in [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz?
questions.answer: TN shows a dramatic relative change over a wide pressure range

questions.question: Does the ratio TN/Bc remain constant as pressure is applied to [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz?
What computational method was used to understand the magnetic exchange in [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz?
What phenomenon is responsible for the giant pressure dependence of the magnetic exchange in [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz?
questions.answer: A progressive redistribution of spin density in the magnetic orbital

questions.question: Is the structural phase transition in [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz associated with a change in the orientation of the magnetic orbital?
What is the role of water ligands in the exchange paths of [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz?
questions.answer: Water ligands are involved in superexchange paths contributing to the magnetic exchange

questions.question: Does the application of pressure lead to a dimensionality switch in the magnetic system of [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz?
What experimental technique was used to determine the Néel temperature under different pressures in [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz?
questions.answer: Temperature dependence of the TDO resonance frequency

questions.question: What is the significance of the pseudo-Jahn-Teller axis in the context of [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz?
questions.answer: It is related to the asymmetry in Cu coordination and plays a role in the orbital reorientation during the phase transition

questions.question: Does the pressure-induced phase transition in [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz result in a decrease in the dominant exchange parameter?
What is the effect of pressure on the Cu-N bond length in the high-pressure β phase of [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz?
questions.answer: The Cu-N bond length is significantly reduced

questions.question: How does the dimensionality of the magnetic system in [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz change after the phase transition?
questions.answer: It switches from a quasi-two-dimensional lattice to weakly coupled chains

questions.question: Is the magnetic orbital reorientation in [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz responsible for the switch in dimensionality of the magnetic system?
What is the role of pyrazine molecules in the structure of [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz?
questions.answer: Pyrazine molecules link the bilayers into a 3D coordination network

questions.question: Does the structural phase transition in [CuF2(H2O)2]2pyz occur at a pressure below 10 kbar?
